app.api.update.views.router
async app.api.update.views.create_update(context: app.api.update.schema.CreateStrategyUpdate, request: fastapi.Request)
async app.api.update.views.create_update(context: app.api.update.schema.CreatePortfolioUpdate, request: fastapi.Request)
async app.api.update.views.modify_update(context: app.api.update.schema.ModifyUpdate, request: fastapi.Request)

The modify_update function is used to modify the content of an update. It takes in a context object, which contains the update_id and new content of the update. The function then checks if that user is authorized to modify that particular post, and if so modifies it.

Parameters

  • context:schema.ModifyUpdate – Used to Pass the update_id and update_content to the function.

  • request:Request – Used to Get the user who is making the request.

Returns

A modifyupdateresponse object.

async app.api.update.views.get_portfolio_updates(context: app.api.update.schema.GetPortfolioUpdates)

The get_portfolio_updates function returns the portfolio updates for a given portfolio.

Parameters

context:schema.GetPortfolioUpdates – Used to Specify the portfolio_id for which to return the updates.

Returns

The portfolio_id.

async app.api.update.views.get_strategy_updates(context: app.api.update.schema.GetStrategyUpdates)

The get_strategy_updates function returns a list of strategy updates for the given strategy_id.

Parameters

context:schema.GetStrategyUpdates – Used to Pass the strategy_id to the function.

Returns

A list of strategy updates for the given strategy id.
